knimeNode.name: Spark Column Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: The Spark Column Filter allows columns to be excluded from the input Spark RDD.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows columns to be filtered from the input Spark RDD while only the remaining columns are passed to the output Spark RDD. Within the dialog, columns can be moved between the Include and Exclude list.
fullDescription.option: This list contains the column names that are included in the output Spark RDD.

Select this option to enforce the current inclusion list to stay the same even if the input Spark RDD specification changes. If some of the included columns are not available anymore, a warning is displayed. (New columns will automatically be added to the exclusion list.)
Use these buttons to move columns between the Include and Exclude list.

Use one of these fields to search either within the Include or Exclude list for certain column names or name substrings. Repeated clicking of the search button marks the next column that matches the search text. The check box 'Mark all search hits' causes all matching columns to be selected making them movable between the two lists.
This list contains the column names of the input Spark RDD that are excluded at the output table.

Select this option to enforce the current exclusion list to stay the same even if the input Spark RDD specification changes. If some of the excluded columns are not available anymore, a warning is displayed. (New columns will automatically be added to the inclusion list.)

ports.inPort: Spark RDD from which columns are to be excluded.
